thread.title: ‘Peru two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum enjoys Six Nations in skimpy Ireland shirt
thread.title_full: ‘Peru two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum enjoys Six Nations in skimpy Ireland shirt

title: ‘Peru two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum enjoys Six Nations in skimpy Ireland shirt
text:
‘Peru two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum enjoys Six Nations in skimpy Ireland shirt ‘Peru two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum enjoys Six Nations in skimpy Ireland shirt PERU two drug mule Michaella McCollum seemed to be enjoying her newly-found freedom as she was spotted wearing an Ireland rugby jersey at a Belfast pub. PUBLISHED: 03:59, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 | UPDATED: 05:01, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 www.iCeleb.TV Convicted drug smuggler Michaella McCollum seemed to be enjoying her life outside prison 
The convicted drug smuggler was arrested in 2013 for attempting to traffic £1.5million worth of cocaine from Spain to Peru. 
But after holidaying in Marbella, where she masterminded her plot, she was spotted sipping wine in her homeland of Northern Ireland. Related articles www.iCelebTV.com The 24-year-old did not seem to need anything more than her rugby jersey 
McCollum, 24, from County Tyrone, was spotted on Friday browsing shops and sipping a cold drink as she donned gym wear during a stroll in town. 
Earlier this month, she took to Facebook to thank "everyone who has supported myself and my family through these past few years". www.iCelebTV.com McCollum was back in Belfast after a quick holiday in Marbella, Spain 
Her post read: “Please know I truly appreciate each one who cared and had my back.” 
“Thank you for all the sweet messages I have not got reading them all just yet or got a chance to reply to them but I will definitely make a good attempt to get back to you all. Peru drugs mule Michaella McCollum back on the beach Sun, February 19, 2017 Michaella McCollum was jailed in Peru for attempting to smuggle £1.5m of cocaine out of the country. Now free, McCollum was spotted on the beach in Peru once again
